analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a "popular" SVG icon with customizable fill color and CSS classes.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable inline SVG icon for use throughout the application’s UI, allowing consumers to set the icon’s fill color and pass along CSS classes.

Components.name: IconPopular
Components.responsibility: Renders an inline SVG graphic and exposes a `fill` prop to customize the icon color. Passes any extra attributes (e.g. class) to the root `<path>` element.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines the component props in `<script setup>` mode.

analysis.Usage: Import and register or directly use in a parent component: `import IconPopular from 'modules/icons/entities/IconPopular.vue'` then `<IconPopular fill="#ff0000" class="my-icon"/>`.
Notes: No `<style>` section—icon styling is expected to be done via props and classes.
SVG markup is hard-coded; viewBox is 0 0 24 24 to match common icon sizing.
